about_the_game:
Ling Tong "is a new Chinese style horror suspense puzzle game that combines click to solve puzzles and storyline adventure.

Starting with the female protagonist Anxi and a group of friends staying at the Tianfu Village homestay, a series of murders occur, telling a story about supporting a spirit child and seeking divine change. As the protagonist delves deeper into the plot, they discover the truth hidden behind it

A movie, a strange dream

Originating from a homestay?

Can Lingtong help you achieve your long cherished wish and make your wishes come true?

剧情背景

  • The female protagonist Anxi, along with a group of four friends, arrived at a famous tourist village - Tianfu Village. Although Tianfu Village is a tourist attraction, it is still relatively niche. Since the incident a few years ago, few people have come back, and other homestay owners have gradually moved out of Tianfu Village, leaving only farewell homes.

  • When checking into the homestay, a series of strange things happened, including the deaths and disappearances of fellow travelers. The eerie cries of a child were everywhere. What secrets were hidden behind this?

解谜丰富

  • The addition of multiple puzzles, rejecting single forms and cleverly hiding mysteries, is only for the enjoyment of solving puzzles in the game.

The gameplay is integrated with the plot, making it easy and difficult to set up. The puzzles blend seamlessly with Chinese aesthetic design.

  • Part of the puzzles are imaginative, novel in form, and both fun and thought-provoking.

疑点重重

  • The interweaving of fate and luck, this is also a story about changing one's destiny. She and they both arrogantly seek to change their own destiny

  • But when you need to change your life, you have to pay the corresponding price, and no one is an exception. Here, some people have paid for love, some have paid for family, and some have paid for conscience

  • Change of destiny, what exactly is being changed?

  • The homestay murder case, Guanyin's bloody and tearful confession unknown, whether it is a wicked child or a mysterious child, the collective evil of elementary school students, the barber shop fire case

  • Multiple cases with numerous doubts, follow the protagonist to uncover the truth behind them step by step? Is it waking up or in a dream, like a dream or a fantasy, like truth or falsehood, past life or present life or karma cycle?

  • The nostalgic Chinese animation style, like playing games in childhood cartoons, exudes a local atmosphere.

  • No face to face killing, experience the eerie and thrilling gaming experience in gameplay and atmosphere.

  • The memories of the 1990s, the summer when watching Hong Kong horror movies, the creaking sound of elevators coming from old residential buildings.
